name: ROMANIAN FARMERS’ CLUB FOR PERFORMANT AGRICULTURE
goal: Romanian Farmers’ Club supports the representation of Romanian performing farmers in the process of consultation and decision-making on the Common Agricultural Policy carried out by the European institutions in the structure of the European Commission and the European Parliament in Brussels, identifying and promoting the specific professional interests of the farmers within the agricultural sector, the economic, technical and legal matters, as well as the cooperation actions of the members of the Association.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Education and training, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives:
• CAP Reform 2020: reduced CAP budget, the capping of the agricultural subsidies.
• National strategic plan for Romania: impact on direct payments, impact on rural development programs.
• Complying with the new environmental and sustainable agriculture requirements under the forthcoming CAP reform.
• Amendment of the law on the sale of agricultural land by non-farmers.
